title: Westcott Right- & Left-Handed Scissors For Kids, 5’’ Pointed Safety Scissors, Assorted, 12 Pack (13141)
description: These 5" pointed scissors are specially designed for a child's hand. The molded, asymmetrical handles allow for either left- or right-handed use. An inside grind on the stainless steel blades make them both accurate and dependable. These small scissors cut through paper, fabric, string, and other craft materials easily. Westcott is dedicated to supporting education and inspiring creative activities in the classroom and at home. Westcott products are specifically designed for growing students and created to be fun and functional with superior quality and exceptional value.
